fixes.name: Loss Ratio
fixes.solution_explanation: Mapped Tableau aggregations to DAX by converting SUM([ClaimAmount]) and SUM([Premium]) to SUM('customers+'[ClaimAmount]) and SUM('customers+'[Premium]) respectively, preserving the original arithmetic division. Column references were transformed to the 'TableName'[ColumnName] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
